name: Hexed Pet Adventures! [BL RPG]
description:
A new town, a new school. Everything should be normal, right? Except it isn't. A few students and a teacher have gotten cursed and turned into animals! Explore the school and learn more about these cursed men to solve each of their problems and lift their curses.

(This RPG remake is completely different from the original visual novel series.)

(For the web build, the sprite will take a second or two to load properly. Sorry for the inconvenience. The web version is slow on some devices so you should download the zip files if possible for a better experience.)

- 5 Love Interests

- 25K Words

- 5 Main Quests & 10 Side Quests

- One of the LI is a teacher.  Skip this game if that makes you uncomfortable.
